verses.verse: וַיִּהְיוּ֙ <WH1961> become חַיֵּ֣י <WH2416> old שָׂרָ֔ה <WH8283> And Sarah מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> hundred שָׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> years וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> and twenty שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> [these were] the years וְשֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> seven שָׁנִ֑ים <WH8141> years שְׁנֵ֖י <WH8141> years חַיֵּ֥י <WH2416> of the life שָׂרָֽה׃ <WH8283> of Sarah

וַתָּ֣מָת <WH4191> died שָׂרָ֗ה <WH8283> And Sarah בְּקִרְיַ֥ת אַרְבַּ֛ע <WH7153> in Kirjatharba הִ֥וא <WH1931> he חֶבְר֖וֹן <WH2275> the same [is] Hebron בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> came אַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> and Abraham לִסְפֹּ֥ד <WH5594> to mourn לְשָׂרָ֖ה <WH8283> for Sarah וְלִבְכֹּתָֽהּ׃ <WH1058> and to weep

וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <WH6965> stood up אַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> And Abraham מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> from פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> from before מֵת֑וֹ <WH4191> his dead וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> and spake אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> unto the sons חֵ֖ת <WH2845> of Heth לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

גֵּר־ <WH1616> I [am] a stranger וְתוֹשָׁ֥ב <WH8453> and a sojourner אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I עִמָּכֶ֑ם <WH5973> among תְּנ֨וּ <WH5414> with you give לִ֤י אֲחֻזַּת־ <WH272> me a possession קֶ֙בֶר֙ <WH6913> of a buryingplace עִמָּכֶ֔ם <WH5973> among וְאֶקְבְּרָ֥ה <WH6912> with you that I may bury מֵתִ֖י <WH4191> my dead מִלְּפָנָֽי׃ <WH6440> out of my sight
וַיַּעֲנ֧וּ <WH6030> answered בְנֵי־ <WH1121> And the children חֵ֛ת <WH2845> of Heth אֶת־ <WH853> אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> Abraham לֵאמֹ֥ר <WH559> saying לֽוֹ׃

שְׁמָעֵ֣נוּ ׀ <WH8085> Hear us אֲדֹנִ֗י <WH113> my lord נְשִׂ֨יא <WH5387> prince אֱלֹהִ֤ים <WH430> thou [art] a mighty אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you בְּתוֹכֵ֔נוּ <WH8432> among us בְּמִבְחַ֣ר <WH4005> in the choice קְבָרֵ֔ינוּ <WH6913> of our sepulchres קְבֹ֖ר <WH6912> bury אֶת־ <WH853> מֵתֶ֑ךָ <WH4191> thy dead אִ֣ישׁ <WH582> another מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <WH4480> at אֶת־ <WH853> קִבְר֛וֹ <WH6913> from thee his sepulchre לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יִכְלֶ֥ה <WH3607> of us shall withhold מִמְּךָ֖ <WH4480> for מִקְּבֹ֥ר <WH6912> but that thou mayest bury מֵתֶֽךָ׃ <WH4191> thy dead

וַיָּ֧קָם <WH6965> stood up אַבְרָהָ֛ם <WH85> And Abraham וַיִּשְׁתַּ֥חוּ <WH7812> and bowed לְעַם־ <WH5971> himself to the people הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the land לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> [even] to the children חֵֽת׃ <WH2845> of Heth

וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> And he communed אִתָּ֖ם <WH854> for לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> with them saying אִם־ <WH518> If יֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> If it be אֶֽת־ <WH853> נַפְשְׁכֶ֗ם <WH5315> your mind לִקְבֹּ֤ר <WH6912> that I should bury אֶת־ <WH853> מֵתִי֙ <WH4191> my dead מִלְּפָנַ֔י <WH6440> out of my sight שְׁמָע֕וּנִי <WH8085> hear וּפִגְעוּ־ <WH6293> me and intreat לִ֖י בְּעֶפְר֥וֹן <WH6085> for me to Ephron בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צֹֽחַר׃ <WH6714> of Zohar

וְיִתֶּן־ <WH5414> That he may give לִ֗י אֶת־ <WH853> מְעָרַ֤ת <WH4631> me the cave הַמַּכְפֵּלָה֙ <WH4375> of Machpelah אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which ל֔וֹ אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בִּקְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> which he hath which [is] in the end שָׂדֵ֑הוּ <WH7704> of his field בְּכֶ֨סֶף <WH3701> money מָלֵ֜א <WH4392> as it is worth יִתְּנֶ֥נָּה <WH5414> he shall give it לִ֛י בְּתוֹכְכֶ֖ם <WH8432> amongst you לַאֲחֻזַּת־ <WH272> me for a possession קָֽבֶר׃ <WH6913> of a buryingplace

וְעֶפְר֥וֹן <WH6085> And Ephron יֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> dwelt בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> among בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the children חֵ֑ת <WH2845> of Heth וַיַּעַן֩ <WH6030> answered עֶפְר֨וֹן <WH6085> and Ephron הַחִתִּ֤י <WH2850> the Hittite אֶת־ <WH853> אַבְרָהָם֙ <WH85> Abraham בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <WH241> in the audience בְנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children חֵ֔ת <WH2845> of Heth לְכֹ֛ל <WH3605> all בָּאֵ֥י <WH935> [even] of all that went in שַֽׁעַר־ <WH8179> at the gate עִיר֖וֹ <WH5892> of his city לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nay אֲדֹנִ֣י <WH113> my lord שְׁמָעֵ֔נִי <WH8085> hear me הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> the field נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> give I לָ֔ךְ וְהַמְּעָרָ֥ה <WH4631> thee and the cave אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after בּ֖וֹ לְךָ֣ נְתַתִּ֑יהָ <WH5414> that [is] therein I give it לְעֵינֵ֧י <WH5869> thee in the presence בְנֵי־ <WH1121> of the sons עַמִּ֛י <WH5971> of my people נְתַתִּ֥יהָ <WH5414> give לָּ֖ךְ קְבֹ֥ר <WH6912> I it thee bury מֵתֶֽךָ׃ <WH4191> thy dead
וַיִּשְׁתַּ֙חוּ֙ <WH7812> bowed down אַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> And Abraham לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> himself before עַ֥ם <WH5971> the people הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the land

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> And he spake אֶל־ <WH413> to עֶפְר֜וֹן <WH6085> unto Ephron בְּאָזְנֵ֤י <WH241> in the audience עַם־ <WH5971> of the people הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> of the land לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying אַ֛ךְ <WH389> will only אִם־ <WH518> If אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you ל֖וּ <WH3863> But if thou [wilt give it] I pray thee שְׁמָעֵ֑נִי <WH8085> hear נָתַ֜תִּי <WH5414> me I will give כֶּ֤סֶף <WH3701> thee money הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> for the field קַ֣ח <WH3947> take מִמֶּ֔נִּי <WH4480> at וְאֶקְבְּרָ֥ה <WH6912> [it] of me and I will bury אֶת־ <WH853> מֵתִ֖י <WH4191> my dead שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> there
וַיַּ֧עַן <WH6030> answered עֶפְר֛וֹן <WH6085> And Ephron אֶת־ <WH853> אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> Abraham לֵאמֹ֥ר <WH559> saying לֽוֹ׃

אֲדֹנִ֣י <WH113> My lord שְׁמָעֵ֔נִי <WH8085> hearken אֶרֶץ֩ <WH776> unto me the land אַרְבַּ֨ע <WH702> [is worth] four מֵאֹ֧ת <WH3967> hundred שֶֽׁקֶל־ <WH8255> shekels כֶּ֛סֶף <WH3701> of silver בֵּינִ֥י <WH996> what [is] that betwixt וּבֵֽינְךָ֖ <WH996> between מַה־ <WH4100> what הִ֑וא <WH1931> he וְאֶת־ <WH853> מֵתְךָ֖ <WH4191> therefore thy dead קְבֹֽר׃ <WH6912> me and thee? bury

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> hearkened אַבְרָהָם֮ <WH85> And Abraham אֶל־ <WH413> to עֶפְרוֹן֒ <WH6085> unto Ephron וַיִּשְׁקֹ֤ל <WH8254> weighed אַבְרָהָם֙ <WH85> and Abraham לְעֶפְרֹ֔ן <WH6085> to Ephron אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּ֕סֶף <WH3701> the silver אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֖ר <WH1696> which he had named בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <WH241> in the audience בְנֵי־ <WH1121> of the sons חֵ֑ת <WH2845> of Heth אַרְבַּ֤ע <WH702> four מֵאוֹת֙ <WH3967> hundred שֶׁ֣קֶל <WH8255> shekels כֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> of silver עֹבֵ֖ר <WH5674> current לַסֹּחֵֽר׃ <WH5503> [money] with the merchant

וַיָּ֣קָם ׀ <WH6965> were made sure שְׂדֵ֣ה <WH7704> And the field עֶפְר֗וֹן <WH6085> of Ephron אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which בַּמַּכְפֵּלָ֔ה <WH4375> which [was] in Machpelah אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> which [was] before מַמְרֵ֑א <WH4471> Mamre הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> the field וְהַמְּעָרָ֣ה <WH4631> and the cave אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בּ֔וֹ וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעֵץ֙ <WH6086> which [was] therein and all the trees אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> that [were] in the field אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all גְּבֻל֖וֹ <WH1366> that [were] in all the borders סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <WH85> Unto Abraham לְמִקְנָ֖ה <WH4736> for a possession לְעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the presence בְנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children חֵ֑ת <WH2845> of Heth בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all בָּאֵ֥י <WH935> before all that went in שַֽׁעַר־ <WH8179> at the gate עִירֽוֹ׃ <WH5892> of his city

וְאַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> And after כֵן֩ <WH3651> this קָבַ֨ר <WH6912> buried אַבְרָהָ֜ם <WH85> Abraham אֶת־ <WH853> שָׂרָ֣ה <WH8283> Sarah אִשְׁתּ֗וֹ <WH802> his wife אֶל־ <WH413> in מְעָרַ֞ת <WH4631> in the cave שְׂדֵ֧ה <WH7704> of the field הַמַּכְפֵּלָ֛ה <WH4375> of Machpelah עַל־ <WH5921> and פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> before מַמְרֵ֖א <WH4471> Mamre הִ֣וא <WH1931> he חֶבְר֑וֹן <WH2275> the same [is] Hebron בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> of Canaan

וַיָּ֨קָם <WH6965> that [is] therein were made sure הַשָּׂדֶ֜ה <WH7704> And the field וְהַמְּעָרָ֧ה <WH4631> and the cave אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after בּ֛וֹ לְאַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> unto Abraham לַאֲחֻזַּת־ <WH272> for a possession קָ֑בֶר <WH6913> of a buryingplace מֵאֵ֖ת <WH853> בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> by the sons חֵֽת׃ <WH2845> of Heth ס
